title: Hotfix Didn't fix the issue for me still
body:
Hey Riot i know you guy's and gals are working hard trying to fix this issue I still have trouble loading up a custom training league takes atleast 5 minutes until it loads up says i have zero ping for the 5 minutes than finally loads the game.

 and when i load in i've got 2-3 fps constantly still doesn't matter if i use windowed mode on lower resolution or higher or lower graphics still has 2-3 fps regardless. 

Hotfix didn't work for me only running league and chrome in the background, hopefully this gets sorted out soon wishing you the best of luck!

here's my dmp file too if it helps!
https://drive.google.com/file/d/14MOSrlRiHxy39b4unk9RTJJCn-94sSFw/view?usp=sharing

replies.body:
Hi LiquidWinter,

Thanks for the dump. It's super helpful.

We looked into it and it seems like there's an issue with your CPU AMD FX/OPTERON (Bulldozer family) and the new code that we've rolled out. 

We're still investigating the root cause of the issue. Updates will be made here as we triage the problem: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/GX3Zhxwe-game-client-anti-cheat-known-issues-and-fixes

Sorry for your troubles.

Likely an issue related to content discussed in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and posting there if you continue to have problems.
